messages: a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (18:26): annevk: what's rumored to be in this Word file you've obtained?
70bfd0ae2cfbf2da192bddd569cf6132 (18:28): Goodmorning :)
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (18:30): Timezoneist
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (18:33): in Japan, for people who work at bars and such at night, it's common to say „Åä„ÅØ„Çà (good morning) no matter what time of day it actually is
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (18:33): when first seeing somebody for the day
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (18:34): even if that happens to be 23:00 in the evening or whatever
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (18:34): what is Viognier?
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (18:34): hmm, Rhone valley
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (18:35): this could be good
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (18:35): looks around for the wine steward

b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (18:36): a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2: In Japan it it common for shop assistants to compete for who can say "Irashaimasen!" in the most whiny voice. Doesn't mean it's a good idea :)
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (18:37): b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea: that's why I wear earblugs
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (18:37): plugs
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (18:38): one unfortunate thing in Japan is that being enthusiastic sometimes (often) means being noisy
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (18:39): e.g., if you go to a baseball game, there is always this huge cheering section of people who do nothing but make noise for the entire game
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (18:39): I think most of them are not actually paying any attention at all to what is going on in the game
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (18:41): wow, this Viognier tastes somewhat like one of those chocolate oranges
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (18:42): Terry's Chocolate Orange
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (18:46): white wine
4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049 (18:46): hahah no i mean who is the vineyard. :)
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (18:47): Gadino Cellars, Greene County, Virginia
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (18:47): apparently
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (18:47): I don't recommend it
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (18:47): unless you really like chocolate oranges
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (18:48): 4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049: btw, b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea may know about the Opera UA stylesheet
